subject: Re: Info
description_text:
Il giorno 19 gen 2026, alle ore 08:05, andrea bartoli <andreabar88@hotmail.it> ha scritto:

﻿ Hi,
1 of 2 package (i think pedals) is being delivered today!
The pedals motor are not being delivered today (and i hope there are no duties on those too!!)
But i must pay (i payed in this moment!) 114,57€ of dutyies!!!!
I attach the invoice of ups courier
In the last email you write that in case of duties you refound me? (I attach your mail in reply)
Best regards
Andrea Bartoli
[image0.png]
[image1.png]

Il giorno 15 gen 2026, alle ore 08:44, support@simsonn.com ha scritto:

﻿
Hi andrea bartoli,

We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse were impacted by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We have already arranged for shipments from China. Should any customs duties arise, we will reimburse you.

On Tue, 13 Jan at 2:49 PM , andrea bartoli <andreabar88@hotmail.it> wrote:
Hi,
Have you shipped my order?
Orde SSN5834
On ups tracking appear “label created” from 07/01/26 but not shipped..
Best regards
Andrea Bartoli

Il giorno 7 gen 2026, alle ore 15:40, support@simsonn.com ha scritto:

﻿
Hi andrea bartoli,

Thank you for your support. We will arrange shipment as soon as possible.


On Wed, 7 Jan at 5:42 PM , andrea bartoli <andreabar88@hotmail.it> wrote:
Hi,
Thanks!!
I have buy now the proX ultra
And i have buy now your vibration motor with power supply
Order SSN5834
Thanks a lot
Best regards
Andrea Bartoli

Il giorno 7 gen 2026, alle ore 10:22, support@simsonn.com ha scritto:

﻿
Hi andrea bartoli,

Our latest pedal models are the ProX Ultra and PlusX, and you can choose either one based on your needs.
The VAM Pro vibration motors can also be purchased separately later as an upgrade.
If you already have a 24V / 3A independent power supply with a 2.5 mm plug, there is no need to purchase our power supply.


On Fri, 2 Jan at 9:06 PM , andrea bartoli <andreabar88@hotmail.it> wrote:
Hi
Im interested to buy your pedal
what is the top of your line product and newest?
The pro X ultra?
And another question, if i buy now your pro x ultra (3 pedals with base ecc) but without aptical motors, can i buy after in future the motors?
I need to buy only the motors (poser supply is present now in the pedals) or i need to buy motors and power supply?
Thanks
Best regards
Andrea Bartoli
9799:4206036
